mitehunter.header: Web system focused on the agricultural sector
mitehunter.description: Web application for managing strawberry crops against spider mites, integrating sampling with AI code. Created as part of a team where I was a full-track developer

techOptions.header: Website to check offers and reviews of tech products
techOptions.description: This system allows you to register products by recording the domain and the value of the best offer and leveling them by user and reviewer ratings

readMore.header: Web solution for recording reading productivity
readMore.description: The system allows users to manage their reading progress, including metrics such as books completed per period and average pages per day
